attributes.action: Force NTL:Telewest/Virgin Media to stop ignoring Milton Keynes and upgrade its infrastructure there!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Milton Keynes was the first town in England to get cable tv. Yet now we are forced to get sky to get digital TV. When the switch over happens we will be forced into the monopoly of Sky! We feel that NTL/Virgin Media should be forced to upgrade the infrastructure in the area!
